data_table.description: Prevalent Vascular Dementia Status at DNA Blood Draw Date for Original Cohort and Offspring Cohort, Original and Offspring Cohorts, blood drawn from 1974 to 2007. Vascular dementia is diagnosed when the dementia is thought to be due to vascular factors affecting the brain. The FHS criteria attempt to operationalize the NINDS-AIREN and ADDTC criteria for vascular dementia.

variable.name: Any_Prev_vad
variable.comment: No prevalent vascular dementia also includes those with prevalent non-vascular dementia.

variable.name: prob_prev_vad
variable.comment: No probable vascular dementia also includes those with possible but not probable vascular dementia.
